for_the_best_experience_enable_javascrip: For the best experience, enable JavaScript.
enable_javascript_to_enhance_your_search: Enable JavaScript to enhance your search!
login_phrase: If you have an account, you can login here. If you enabled cookies, this will happen automatically if you've logged in before.
register_phrase: You can access 90% of this site without an account, but for the little extra, you'll need to register.
my_profile_phrase: It's your profile. Do you need me to explain more?
my_mail_phrase: Check your messages and reply to them.
my_favourites_phrase: View all of your favorites and remove them if you wish.
admin_panel_phrase: Administer the site. Only available to moderators and administrators.
options_phrase: Manage local browser settings, account blacklist, and more.
logout_phrase: Make like a tree and get out of here! Click here to logout of your account.
you_can_register_here: You can register for an account [here].
by_logging_in: By logging in, you accept the use of Cookies.
if_your_browser_doesnt_support_cookies: If your browser doesn't support cookies, you won't be able to login.
in_case_you_already_have_an_account: In case you already have an account, login [here].
by_signing_up: By signing up you acknowledge you have read our [terms_of_service_and_privacy_policy].
terms_of_service_and_privacy_policy: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
chaning_your_password: Changing your password will destory all sessions and log you out.
there_are_no_guidelines_avaliable: There are no guidelines available. You can edit them in the Admin-Area.
before_uploading_please_read_the_guideli: Before uploading, please read the following guidelines:
seperate_tags_with_spaces: Separate tags with spaces. Use underscores for multi-word tags. (e.g. 'multi_word_tag')
you_can_use_prefixes: You can use prefixes to specify the type of tag. (e.g. 'character:alice')
if_your_post_is_not_listed_right_away: If your post is not listed right away, it requires moderator approval. Approval may take up to 14 days, do not contact staff about this.
check_your_blacklist: Check your [blacklist]. We now automatically omit terms from your search when you have any tag there.
your_browser_does_not_support_the_video_: Your browser does not support the video tag.
this_post_has_been_deleted_reason: This post has been deleted. Reason: [reason]
this_term_has_been_locked_by_a_moderator: This Term has been locked by a moderator.
this_term_is_open_for_editing: This Term is open for editing.
trouble_with_your_blacklist: Trouble with your Blacklist? Try enabling JavaScript.
name: Name
update_system_phrase: Update your OpenBooru and keep it fresh forever (unlike those 3D women)!
approval_queue_phrase: Check, approve or delete posts that are awaiting approval.
reports_phrase: Check post and comment reports and take action on them.
you_dont_have_permission_to_delete_posts: You don't have permission to delete posts
you_dont_have_permission_to_restore_post: You don't have permission to restore posts
you_need_to_be_logged_in_to_favourite_a_: You need to be logged in to favourite a post
tag_has_to_be_at_least_x_characters_long: Tag has to be at least [count] characters long
please_read_the_documentation_on_how_to_: Please [read_the_documentation] on how to fix the errors.
click_next_to_fill_the_database: Click next to fill the database with the necessary tables and data.
click_next_to_create_the_default_admin_a: Click next to create the default admin account.
make_sure_to_change_the_username_and_pas: Make sure to change the username and password after logging in!!!
